How to study for history/SS ah
The second SEQ question for history is always so anal
Tbh  u need to know ur content well
Just treat it as exploring something new
Dun think of it as the past
history know when to use ck
if u got time then whack essays lul
i realised only now that whacking essays is the best way to score humans
"exploring something new" more like propaganda for ss
The issue is that the second SEQ question in history requires you to actually understand the topic
Like unless if you can whack all the possible essays memorizing alone won‚Äôt really work
Memorize in a strategic manner not word for word
Like link up the different events n interrelation between the characters
And memorize the underlying factors beneath them
U can draw out these interrelation of events n characters in diagram form to internalize
So when u reurgitate during exam it would not be like u rewriting the whole text book
It will expedite u to a higher level mark range too
So in a way preparation work is required during revision. Linking up these is essentially preparatory work
